pages.title: Making Cheese
pages.text: So...this one is a bit more complicated and involves quite a bit of RNG. Basically the Random Tick Speed plus another number generator decide when the milk turns into cheese. $(br)Otherwise follow these steps: $(li) Put three bottles of milk (culinaire) into a cauldron. $(li) Wait. $(li) You get three cheese slices.

pages.title: Cheese Coagulation
pages.text: $(o)In my test trial it took 45 minutes to change 8 out of 16 placed cauldrons in a chunk
